title: Brightness
alt: Recently, some exoplanet astronomers have managed to use careful analysis of reflected light to discover Earth during the day.
transcript:
[A black panel with white text and a white Megan who is standing staring at the ground.]
Megan: Based on this decrease in the star's brightness, I believe it is orbited by at least one planet.[Caption below the panel:]
Exoplanet astronomers at night
